## lefaso-net-scraper

### Description
lefaso-net-scraper is a robust and versatile Python library designed to efficiently extract articles from the popular online news source, lefaso.net. This powerful scraping tool allows users to effortlessly collect article content and data from Internet usersâ€™ comments on [www.lefaso.net](https://www.lefaso.net).

# Data Format

| Field                  | Description            |
|------------------------|------------------------|
| article_topic          | article topic          |
| article_title          | article title          |
| article_published_date | article published date |
| article_origin         | article origin         |
| article_url            | article url            |
| article_content        | article content        |
| article_comments       | article comments       |
